ApproxsimClient.map.adapter
Class MapActivityAdapter

java.lang.Object
  ApproxsimClient.map.adapter.MapDrawableAdapter
      ApproxsimClient.map.adapter.MapElementAdapter
          ApproxsimClient.map.adapter.MapActivityAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, ApproxsimObjectAdapter, ApproxsimEventListener
public class MapActivityAdapter
extends MapElementAdapter

MapActivityAdapter adapts ApproxsimObjects descendants of Activity for viewing on a map window.

Method Detail

updateConnectionArrowDisplayList

protected void updateConnectionArrowDisplayList(Projection proj,
                                                javax.media.opengl.GLAutoDrawable gld)
Updates (recreates) the displayList that draws the connection arrow between the activity this adapter represents and the military unit which owns it.

Parameters:
proj - the projection that maps lat and long into GL coordinates.
gld - the gl drawable targeted.

ownedByMilitaryUnit

public boolean ownedByMilitaryUnit()
Returns true if the activity this adapter adapts owns by a military unit, false otherwise.

getOwner

public ApproxsimObject getOwner()
Returns the military unit that owns the activity this adapter adapts.If the activity is not owned by a military unit, null is returned.

hasLocation

public boolean hasLocation()
Returns true if the activity this adapter adapts has location, false otherwise.

arrowDisplayed

public boolean arrowDisplayed()
Returns true if the connection arrow between the avtivity and it's owner is displayed, false otherwise.

setArrowDisplayed

public void setArrowDisplayed(boolean displayed)
Updates the state of the adapter.

Parameters:
displayed - if true the connection arrow has to be displayed on the map, otherwise not.
